DocConstant.Name: BLADE
DocConstant.Documentation: A blade is a machined rail, often of special section, but fixed and/or joined at the heel end to a rail to provide continuity of wheel support. The two switch rails in a set are the two inside rails. A switch rail is described as right or left hand according to whether it is part of a right hand or left hand half-set of switches. Note: definition from EN 13232-1-2004.
